page.title: 02Richard Taunton's College #1
page.content: Richard Taunton's is a 6th form college for 16_18 year olds.At the start of the term there are about 600 students,now there are about 550 students.They have mordernized the buildings because they only moved in to that place in 1920,although Richard Tauntons was founded in 1760.Before 1978 Richard Tauntons was a school for boys.The actual building looks very large,but it is only two storeys high and has corridors running all around. With a nice area in the middle.The maths building is the most recently built building.It has six class rooms,one library,cloakrooms and a staff room.There are forty two full time teachers and one headmaster.Average "O" level class Es20_25,avrage "A" classes 12_18 pupils.
